data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 16,908 believers in Rajnandgaon, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 124 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 16,908 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,520,192 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Mukha Dhora people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we pray that the county of Rajnandgaon be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,537,100 people living in Rajnandgaon through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Rajnandgaon, Chhattisgarh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Rajnandgaon
location.people_groups_list: Sauntia, Aray Mala, Gadaba, Anamuk, Lohar (Hindu traditions)
